function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Patient data privacy violation through unsecured data sharing","Impact":"Compromised patient privacy, legal implications, and loss of trust in healthcare system","Mitigation":"Implement encryption and access control policies, adhere to data-sharing regulations, and conduct regular security audits","Technologies":"Encryption, access control mechanisms, blockchain","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, data security experts","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, regulatory bodies, data security experts"},{"Description":"Data forging and mutation in medical IoT devices","Impact":"Inaccurate treatment decisions, compromised patient safety, and legal implications","Mitigation":"Implement blockchain for data integrity, secure medical IoT devices, and use tamper-evident technologies","Technologies":"Blockchain, tamper-evident technologies, secure IoT devices","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, medical device manufacturers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, medical device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Unavailability of secure and reliable data sharing in education sector","Impact":"Disruption of education, compromised learning outcomes, and technological disparities","Mitigation":"Implement blockchain for secure and verifiable academic records, ensure data accessibility for all students, and provide necessary infrastructure for online education","Technologies":"Blockchain, online learning platforms, academic record verification systems","People":"Students, educators, education administrators","Owner":"Educational institutions, education administrators"}]}
